an10.119:1.1: Tena kho pana samayena janussoni brahmano tadahuposathe sisamnhato navam khomayugam nivattho allakusamutthim adaya bhagavato avidure ekamantam thito hoti.
an10.119:2.1: Addasa kho bhagava janussonim brahmanam tadahuposathe sisamnhatam navam khomayugam nivattham allakusamutthim adaya ekamantam thitam.
an10.119:2.3: “kim nu tvam, brahmana, tadahuposathe sisamnhato navam khomayugam nivattho allakusamutthim adaya ekamantam thito?
an10.119:3.1: “Yatha katham pana, brahmana, brahmananam paccorohani hoti”ti?
an10.119:3.2: “Idha, bho gotama, brahmana tadahuposathe sisamnhata navam khomayugam nivattha allena gomayena pathavim opunjitva haritehi kusehi pattharitva antara ca velam antara ca agyagaram seyyam kappenti.
an10.119:3.3: Te tam rattim tikkhattum paccutthaya panjalika aggim namassanti:
an10.119:3.6: Tassa ca rattiya accayena panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena brahmane santappenti.
an10.119:3.7: Evam, bho gotama, brahmananam paccorohani hoti”ti.
an10.119:4.1: “Annatha kho, brahmana, brahmananam paccorohani hoti, annatha ca pana ariyassa vinaye paccorohani hoti”ti.
an10.119:4.2: “Yatha katham pana, bho gotama, ariyassa vinaye paccorohani hoti?
an10.119:4.3: Sadhu me bhavam gotamo tatha dhammam desetu yatha ariyassa vinaye paccorohani hoti”ti.
an10.119:5.1: “Tena hi, brahmana, sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
an10.119:5.2: “Evam, bho”ti kho janussoni brahmano bhagavato paccassosi.
an10.119:15.5: Evam kho, brahmana, ariyassa vinaye paccorohani hoti”ti.
an10.119:16.1: “Annatha, bho gotama, brahmananam paccorohani, annatha ca pana ariyassa vinaye paccorohani hoti.
an10.119:16.2: Imissa ca, bho gotama, ariyassa vinaye paccorohaniya brahmananam paccorohani kalam nagghati solasim.
an10.119:16.4: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
